ComicInfo.Summary:
“KIDS’ NIGHT OUT!"
In their first-ever adventure, Malcolm Dragon’s kids chase down a deadly threat on their own. But the menace they face is no ordinary foe—it’s the latest addition to the Dragon family, unleashed against an unsuspecting populace.
ComicInfo.Title: The Mighty Skullboy Army; Kids' Day Out!
ComicInfo.Writer: Chris Giarrusso,Erik Larsen,Jacob Chabot,Chris Giarrusso,Jacob Chabot,Erik Larsen
